SevenStringLute.NAME: Seven-String Lute
SevenStringLute.FLAVOR: The Seven-String Lute is famously difficult and impressive to play.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle and whenever you play a #yChord, gain

SilverStringedLute.NAME: Silver-Stringed Lute
SilverStringedLute.FLAVOR: The Silver-Stringed Lute is said to have been brought to the Spire from the faerie realm.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle and whenever you play a #yChord, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

PerformersMotley.NAME: Performer's Motley
PerformersMotley.FLAVOR: A coat made up of a wide variety of colours, designed to make the wearer appear harmless.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a buff or debuff, gain 2 Block.
